cause.description:
The Purpose of New Community Church's Celebrate Recovery is to provide a loving non-judgemental, accepting place for people to come with their hurts, habits, and hang-ups. We share our experiences, strengths, and hopes with one another, and God's healing power in our lives. By applying the 8 recovery principles and the 12 Steps and thier Biblical comparisons we become free from our addictive, compulsive, and dysfunctional behaviors, and instead have peace, serenity and joy that comes from a personal relationship with our higher power-Jesus Christ.
http://www.commrecovery.com/
1. Recovery is possible, All things are possible with GOD...!
cause.mission: To offer weekly recovery services which encourage the use of artistic talents and personal testimonies that express God’s grace and forgiveness so that worship becomes the foundation of healing
cause.name: Community Recovery @ New Community Church
